import React from 'react'; import '../styles/AnimationContainer.css'; import {Fade, Flip, Rotate, Zoom, Bounce, Slide, Roll, LightSpeed, Reveal, reactReveal} from 'react-reveal'; // import reactDom from 'react-dom'; // import Reveal from 'react-reveal/Reveal'; // import reactReveal from 'react-reveal/Reveal'; /*animationDirections.map( (animationDirection, i) => { return( //
{animationDirection}
// {animationDirection} // {animationDirection} // {animationDirection} // {animationDirection} ) } )*/ function AnimationContainer({animationDirections, animationType}) { return (
{ (animationType === 'Fade') ? <> Top Right Bottom Left :(animationType === 'Flip') ? <> Top Right Bottom Left :(animationType === 'Rotate') ? <> Top Left Top Right Bottom Left Bottom Right :(animationType === 'Zoom') ? <> Top Right Bottom Left :(animationType === 'Bounce') ? <> Top Right Bottom Left :(animationType === 'Slide') ? <> Top Right Bottom Left :(animationType === 'Roll') ? <> Top Right Bottom Left :(animationType === 'LightSpeed') ? <> Left Right :(animationType === 'Jump') ? Jump :(animationType === 'Flash') ? Flash :(animationType === 'HeadShake') ? HeadShake :(animationType === 'Jello') ? Jello :(animationType === 'Pulse') ? Pulse :(animationType === 'RubberBand') ? RubberBand :(animationType === 'Shake') ? Shake :(animationType === 'Spin') ? Spin :(animationType === 'Tada') ? Tada :(animationType === 'Wobble') ? Wobble : null }
) } export default AnimationContainer
